caption.p: Damage assessment of Topito peppers at different durations. Day 10 ( A– F) and 51 ( G– L) of evaluation: peppers and leaves with slight signs of infection in treatment with 20 capsules of EO and without signs of infection in treatments with 30 and 40 capsules of EO. Peppers and leaves with serious signs of infection in controls with 20, 30, and 40 capsules of corn oil.
